examples.translation: これは正しいです。(This is correct.)
すべて大丈夫です。(Everything is alright.)
ちょうど時間通りに (right on time)

collocations: ठीक समय पर (theek samay par) - right on time

usage_notes.explanation: 'Theek' is a common word in Hindi and Urdu, used in many everyday situations. It can express agreement, acceptance, or simply indicate that something is in order.

examples.incorrect: मैं ठीक हूँ। (main theek hun.) - Said when unwell.
examples.note: 'Theek' implies 'correct' or 'alright' rather than 'well'. Use 'achchha' for feeling well.

phrases: ठीक है? (theek hai?) - Is that okay?
ठीक है, चलो (theek hai, chalo) - Okay, let's go

readability_explanation.text: 'Theek' is a very common word in Hindi and Urdu, used to say that something is 'correct', 'okay', or 'alright'. It is one of the first words that learners of these languages will encounter.

example_sentences.sentence: क्या सब ठीक है? (kya sab theek hai?)
यह जवाब ठीक है। (yah jawab theek hai.)
ठीक, मैं आ रहा हूँ। (theek, main aa raha hun.)
